__comments: Sample template to deploy a vCenter Server Appliance with an embedded Platform Services Controller on a vCenter Server instance.
'datacenter' must end with a datacenter name, and only with a datacenter name.
'target' must end with an ESXi hostname, a cluster name, or a resource pool name.
The item 'Resources' must precede the resource pool name.
All names are case-sensitive.
For details and examples, refer to template help, i.e. vcsa-deploy {install|upgrade|migrate} --template-help
vc.hostname: <FQDN or IP address of the vCenter Server instance>
vc.username: <The user name of a user with administrative privileges or the Single Sign-On administrator on vCenter.>
vc.password: <The password of a user with administrative privileges or the Single Sign-On administrator on vCenter. If left blank, or omitted, you will be prompted to enter it at the command console during template verification.>
vc.datastore: <A specific datastore accessible to the ESXi host or DRS cluster in the 'target' path.>
target: Folder B (parent of Your ESXi Host, or Cluster)

__comments: You must provide the 'deployment_option' key with a value, which will affect the VCSA's configuration parameters, such as the VCSA's number of vCPUs, the memory size, the storage size, and the maximum numbers of ESXi hosts and VMs which can be managed. For a list of acceptable values, run the supported deployment sizes help, i.e. vcsa-deploy --supported-deployment-sizes
appliance.name: Embedded-vCenter-Server-Appliance

network.system_name: <FQDN or IP address for the appliance. Optional when the mode is Static. Remove this if using dhcp.>
network.ip: <Static IP address. Remove this if using dhcp.>
network.prefix: <Network prefix length. Use only when the mode is 'static'. Remove if the mode is 'dhcp'. This is the number of bits set in the subnet mask; for instance, if the subnet mask is 255.255.255.0, there are 24 bits in the binary version of the subnet mask, so the prefix length is 24. If used, the values must be in the inclusive range of 0 to 32 for IPv4 and 0 to 128 for IPv6.>
network.gateway: <Gateway IP address. Remove this if using dhcp.>
dns_servers: <DNS Server IP Address. Optional when the mode is Static. Remove this if using dhcp.>

os.password: <Appliance root password; refer to --template-help for password policy. If left blank, or omitted, you will be prompted to enter it at the command console during template verification.>

sso.password: <vCenter Single Sign-On administrator password; refer to --template-help for password policy. If left blank, or omitted, you will be prompted to enter it at the command console during template verification.>
